official_title: To authorize appropriations to reimburse States for costs of educating certain illegal alien students.
short_title: Illegal Alien Educational Impact Aid Act of 1999

summary.text: Illegal Alien Educational Impact Aid Act of 1999 - Directs the Secretary of Education to provide grants to States for certain educational costs for eligible illegal alien students. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Illegal Alien Educational Impact Aid Act of 1999
To authorize appropriations to reimburse States for costs of educating certain illegal alien students.
